list_definition.definition: (of a person) liking or good at sport; athletic
(of clothes) attractive in a bright informal way
(of a car) fast, elegant, and expensive

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He drives a sporty Alfa Romeo.

list_ex_of_english: Inside was a sporty and luxurious interior highlighted by a wraparound cockpit-style instrument panel, bucket seats and center console.
Updated styling to the front end and the addition of a spoiler to the rear aimed to create a bolder and sportier look.
The car had distinctive sporty styling, including an integrated rear spoiler.
The models were not sporty, as the company specialized in stately, elegant carriages.
Yaguchi designed this car as a mix between a luxury car and a very sporty car.
Today, many compact executive cars particularly emphasize sporty handling.
In a parallel development, however, a sportier style of shirt emerged with unstarched cuffs that could be secured with simple buttons.
While being red according to 1946 documents, it has been resprayed metallic blue, and then black by current owner, who also replaced the original windshield with a smaller, sportier one.
